properties.displayName: Communication To LocaltoNet Tunneling Service Initiated
properties.query:
DeviceNetworkEvents
| where RemoteUrl endswith ".localto.net" or RemoteUrl endswith ".localtonet.com"

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects an executable initiating a network connection to "LocaltoNet" tunneling sub-domains.
LocaltoNet is a reverse proxy that enables localhost services to be exposed to the Internet.
Attackers have been seen to use this service for command-and-control
